posts.postText:
Bob, Steve, Joe, and Frank are playing TTT.
Bob is a traitor, the rest are innocent.
Frank has been hiding the whole round and has not seen anyone.
Bob kills Steve.
Frank, hearing gunfire, does a live check.
Only Joe Responds.
Frank believes Steve and Bob to be dead.
Frank kills Joe when he sees him.

 Did Frank RDM?
Depends if he said "alive check if you don't respond then you will be killed on sight"
